alert: We are currently working on the Hyakka Ryouran event starting on 2025/6/25. The update for the item types and quantities up to lap 6 has been completed to the latest version, but since the item quantities from lap 7 onward are unknown, provisional values have been set. If you know the item quantities from lap 7 onward, please report via
We would greatly appreciate your help in improving the data accuracy.
